about_the_game:
Leave a Light is a challenging survival horror game that rejects the idea of scripted jumpscares. All moments of terror occur naturally, and all are deadly. You are never safe.

STORY
You play as Nathan, a young man whose only chance out of debt is the final will of his estranged father, lost somewhere in his remote manor estate. Trapped in the manor by a storm, Nathan soon discovers that dark secrets lie hidden in the manor's shadows - along with a dark force that pursues him from them. With a single flashlight serving as his only means of survival, Nathan must keep his light sources close.

FEATURES
  • Completely organic jumpscares - every surprise is orchestrated collaboratively between the player, the environment, and the thing that lurks within the manor
  • A rich story told through discovered notes, documents, and letters
  • Four modes of increasing challenge and difficulty
  • Each difficulty mode comes with unique lore to discover
  • A secret ending accessible to those who discover all of the manor's secrets

Warning: This game game features flashing lights and gameplay is heavily dependent on audio cues.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything better than a tin can
  • Memory: 60 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything better than an old boot
  • Sound Card: Anything at all, really

short_description: Alone in the darkened manor, terrible secrets wait to be brought to light. Discover the clues to your family's past, and search for supplies that may help you survive what lurks in the shadows.
